def left(s):
	s = s[-1]+s[:-1]
	s = s.lstrip('0')
	return s

def right(s):
	s = s[1:]+s[0]
	s = s.lstrip('0')
	return s

num = int(raw_input())
while num:
	n = raw_input()
	maximum = max(int(left(right(n))),int(right(left(n))))

	tmp = n
	for j in range(len(n)):
		tmp = left(tmp)
		maximum = max(int(tmp),maximum)
	
	tmp = n
	for k in range(len(n)):
		tmp = right(tmp)
		maximum = max(int(tmp),maximum)
		
	print maximum

	num = num-1
